sentences.sContent: ...To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports...
...If you're too concerned with outcomes to the extent that you manipulate and intimidate others toachieve those outcomes...
...providing information about the extent to which biology influences mind...
I was amazed at the extent of his knowledge.
sentences.sCn: 他知识之渊博令我惊奇。

sentences.sContent: You can't see the full extent of the beach from here.
sentences.sCn: 从这儿看不到海滩全貌。

trans.tranOther: how large, important, serious, etc. sth is
